name: No Man's Asteroids
description:
Announcement Post

___________________________________________________

A UN pact has turned local space into a No Man's Land, allowing the minerals located in the asteroids to be sold to the highest bidder. Welcome to No Man's Asteroids.

This is a fun little Asteroids-style game, soon to have way more features and feel a lot more like a finished 'game'. However, in it's current state, it has an endgame goal, an ending, and some really fun dogfights. I hope to update again soon, with more features, ships, and sound.

Like the game, and want to support me? Buy the source code, only $0.25 . If you'd rather not pay that, all of the code and assets are still available at Github. Thanks for playing!

-Enemby
